Posts.Content: mlh031712 wrote: So I've had a negative mam and ultrasound and have seen a general surgeon who feels that it is probably not BC. But my concern is that I've in menopause for almost 6 years and I'm on estrogen and progesterone shots. My left breast is dull and achy and the pain is radiating to my armpit and up near my collar bone. I've read a lot about BC not being painful but have also read that people had the same problem and it was painful. My surgeon recommended going in to just remove the entire area if it affected me that much but stated that he didn't want to just jump to surgery. Any thoughts or suggestions????
